definition: to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
surname Zha
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
see 山查[shan1 zha1]

sentences.english: Conclusion The above procedure is necessary for the ankle sprains with the injury of the common peroneal nerve.
sentences.chinese: 结论踝扭伤出现腓总神经损伤者应作探查松解减压术。

sentences.english: This is China"s first exploration depth of the documentary work marriage asexual."
sentences.chinese: 这是中国第一部深度探查无性婚姻的纪实作品。

sentences.english: Using cues, clues and hints to detect the hidden relationships.
sentences.chinese: 运用各种暗示点对隐藏的事理逻辑线索进行探查。

sentences.english: She want to prob my hurt, want to know I think.
sentences.chinese: 她试图探查我的心意，想知道我在想什么。

sentences.english: Standing in front of a mirror will help in looking for any possible swelling on the scrotum.

sentences.english: At the right is a probe patent foramen ovale in an adult.

sentences.chinese: 但是，这往往局限于小的探查演练。

sentences.english: A laparotomy was performed and the tumor was resected.
sentences.chinese: 遂行剖腹探查及肿瘤切除。

sentences.english: Methylene blue injection into breast duct in operation could help surgeons to explore and resect lesions.
sentences.chinese: 病变乳管内置管美兰注射有助于病灶的探查和切除。

sentences.english: Remote debugging increases the total surface area that can be probed.
sentences.chinese: 远端侦错会增加能够探查的整体表面范围。

sentences.english: Their task is exploring oil mines in the west.
sentences.chinese: 他们的任务是在西部探查油矿。

sentences.english: Conclusion Operations research should be done immediately for the cases with early diagnosis or high …
sentences.chinese: 结论对明确诊断或有高度怀疑时，应积极行手术探查。

sentences.english: Currently, the exit probe point is supported for system calls only.
sentences.chinese: 当前，对于系统调用，只支持出口探查点。

sentences.english: After the teaching intervention, ascertains the situation of student's conceptual understanding.
sentences.chinese: 而后探查了教学干预后学生的化学概念理解情况。

sentences.english: The fist part is about the research on probability of Zhao's misreading.
sentences.chinese: 文章第一个部分对造成赵孟𫖯误读的可能性进行探查。

sentences.english: Today the principal tools for prospecting the brain are electrical.
sentences.chinese: 当今探查人脑的主要工具是用电的。

definition: to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
to check/to investigate/to probe (into)
to find out/to ascertain/to get an idea of
to make inquiries/to try to find out/to pry
to make discreet inquiries/to scout out
to search/to look for
response/reaction/interaction/irritability (biol.)/induction (elec.)/inductance
to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
to peep at/to spy on/to peek
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
to detect/to sense
to submerge/to infiltrate/to steal into
to pry into or spy on/to snoop/to peep/to poke one's nose into/to peer/to get a glimpse of
to watch/to look carefully at
secret/hidden
